paragraphs: Hi! Welcome to my website. I am a PhD student at Columbia University, where I work with the fabulous Shipra Agrawal. I am excited by research questions under the broad umbrella of reinforcement learning and algorithm design.

In 2021, I graduated from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign with a Master in Computer Science, where I was part of Nan Jiang's RL theory group. In the past, I was a strategist at Goldman Sachs.
